emuInput.TitMainTitle: Home of Donald Evans on Burrows Street in the Hill District
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1959, page 4, reads: "New Home - This... Burrows St. was purchased... Donald Evans under a plan by which persons displaced... Urban Renewal Programs may purchase re... under a mortgage available with no down payment and 100 per cent financing. - Harris Photo."
